name: Charlotte Smoothie
text: [On Play] If you have a face-up Life card, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Then, turn all of your Life cards face-down.

effect.text: If you have a face-up Life card, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Then, turn all of your Life cards face-down.
